name: RuleForge
signal_source: User complaints show productivity apps 'require me to manually assign a date and time to every single entry' and 'do zero of the heavy lifting for me'
description: Simple personal automation app that creates if-then rules for daily tasks without requiring technical knowledge
target_user: Busy professionals who want task automation but find existing apps too complex or requiring too much manual setup
pain_point_evidence: Users report 'steep learning curve' and 'too many features can be overwhelming' with existing automation tools
core_loop: Define simple if-then rules in plain language
differentiation: Plain language rule creation vs. technical automation, focuses on simplicity over power
subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited rules, advanced triggers, and cloud sync across devices

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic rules, premium for unlimited automation and cloud features
